thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 30 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Royal Bank Of Scotland Says Ring-Fencing Transfer Scheme Effective

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Royal Bank Of Scotland Says Ring-Fencing Transfer Scheme Effective

organizations.name: brief-royal bank of scotland says ring-fencing
royal bank of scotland group plc

text:
April 30 (Reuters) - Royal Bank of Scotland Group PLC :
* RING-FENCING TRANSFER SCHEME EFFECTIVE
* PROPOSED RING-FENCING TRANSFER SCHEME UNDER PART VII OF FINANCIAL SERVICES AND MARKETS ACT 2000 SANCTIONED BY COURT OF SESSION IN SCOTLAND
* IN JULY 2018, RBS GROUP PLANS TO RESTRUCTURE NATWEST MARKETS PLC CAPITAL STRUCTURE VIA A COURT APPROVED CAPITAL REDUCTION.
* IN MAY 2018, RBS GROUP INTENDS TO COMMENCE, IN COURT OF SESSION IN SCOTLAND, A SECOND RFTS TO TRANSFER CERTAIN CUSTOMER DERIVATIVES FROM NATWEST BANK TO NATWEST MARKETS PLC Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
